I am a ‘Ramón y Cajal’ Researcher at the [**Department of Sociology**](https://www.uab.cat/en/sociology) of the [**Autonomous University of Barcelona**](https://www.uab.cat/web/universitat-autonoma-de-barcelona-1345467954774.html) and a member of the research group [**Globalisation, Education and Social Policies (GEPS)**](https://geps-uab.cat/)

My research areas are education privatisation and markets, educational policies and inequalities. In these areas, I have developed different research lines, including the political economy of education reforms, the enactment of education policies and their impact on equity.
